title: Gene Editing: The Future of Genomic Medicine & Biotech Investing
description: In the latest episode of Exchanges at Goldman Sachs, Salveen Richter, Lead Analyst for the U.S. Biotechnology Sector in Goldman Sachs Research, explains how new innovations in gene editing are transforming the future of medicine and the greater biotech investment landscape.
itunes:author: Goldman Sachs
